channel.title: Analysis on Natrium Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Analysis on Natrium Theme

item.title: The Alleged Return of the Bear: Framing Russian Threat and NATO Discourse in Finland
item.description: This article was written by Miika Korja just before Finland’s national elections on 19 April 2015. Most of the content is still very relevant, and discusses the impact of Russia’s behaviour in the international arena on the NATO debate in Finland. In 2012 the Commander of the Russian Armed Forces General Nikolai Makarov, publicly advised Finland not to become a member of NATO, as this would render a security threat for Russia.

item.title: The gender gap in director compensation at S&P500 firms
item.description: Data and scripts available upon request After reading several articles on remuneration across gender in the boards of S&P500 firms (see here, here and here), I wondered if it was possible to get a closer look at it. I happened to have access to BoardEx, a high-quality database that contains a lot of information on corporate boards and their board members, so I wrote a little script to scrape all the data about S&P500 board members.
